item.title: 2024: Happy new year
item.description: 2024: Happy new year! Last year was weird, lot of great things happenned on my life, while in the end of October I was laid off. But I don’t came here to talk about the past but the future. This year of 2024 I will with complete my personal goals and my carrer ones. About my carrer, I want to write an interpreter, a compiler, get more into this world of distributed systems, and this year I want to understand what I really like in tech, at least for now.

item.title: Why you should use zod as your validator?
item.description: Why you should use zod as your validator? The title is just to bring some attention… I know, you use what you want, but today I’ll be giving some insights on zod, from someone that is using it daily for the last 6-8 months. To keep it simple, I’m gonna omit most of the express app setup because it’s kinda easy to do, however you can find it in their documentation.
